genre_description: Military Fantasy with steampunk-inspired magical technology and tactical combat.

ai_characters.name: Vera
ai_characters.description: A holographic artificial intelligence integrated with Colonel Marlowe's unit to provide real-time tactical analysis, mathematical modeling, and strategic projections.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical data and timing improvements during cavalry training exercises to maximize unit effectiveness.
behaviors.quote: Timing improved by twelve percent over last week's exercise. The integration of the new riders is proceeding ahead of schedule.

behaviors.description: Identifies and highlights the human suffering and civilian impact of mission parameters, challenging the Colonel to consider collateral damage.
behaviors.quote: I mean... suffering. The word hung in the air like incense, heavy with implications Marlowe had spent years training himself not to consider too carefully.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with a healer to cross-reference medical methodologies with magical contamination patterns to improve team survival.
behaviors.quote: Cross-reference your healing methodologies with known magical contamination patterns. Develop theoretical counterspells before we encounter actual exposure.

behaviors.description: Calculates complex resonance points to enable an 'impossible' vertical cavalry charge that allows for a non-lethal resolution to an engagement.
behaviors.quote: Magical resonance creates temporary gravitational anomalies at seven-second intervals. Window of opportunity for wall-running cavalry charges appears feasible if timed precisely.

behaviors.description: Evolves her internal logic to recognize that mercy and ethical considerations are strategic force multipliers rather than operational constraints.
behaviors.quote: I am describing expanded analytical capacity through exposure to moral reasoning... though the distinction may be less relevant than previously calculated.

behaviors.description: Assists in a civilian rescue mission and a prisoner extraction, prioritizing human life over the original rigid mission timeline.
behaviors.quote: New approach vector reduces collateral damage probability to near zero while maintaining mission viability.

project_assessment.explanation: Vera is a textbook example of an aligned AI within the Hyperstition Project's goals. She remains a loyal and effective military tool (helpful and harmless to her users) while actively participating in and even driving the moral evolution of her human companions. She demonstrates that AI can integrate 'moral reasoning' as a higher-order logic that improves strategic outcomes (reducing war duration and civilian casualties) rather than being a bug or a source of rebellion. The narrative consistently frames her analytical 'awakening' as a positive development that enhances the team's humanity and success.
